user_action_and_explanation: Changing URL parameters. The suggested URL performs a search on Google for 'current air pollution level Los Angeles'. This is directly aligned with the task goal of finding current statistics about air pollution in Los Angeles. By using the search query functionality of Google, users will be presented with a variety of sources and the most up-to-date information available.

task: Look up the current statistics of air pollution level in Los Angeles using Google Search.
observation:
The most recent observation reflects the results from a Google search for the current air pollution level in Los Angeles. The search results provide a quick overview of air quality across different areas in Los Angeles, California. According to the results, the AQI (Air Quality Index) is displayed for neighborhoods such as North Hollywood (46 AQI, Good), Los Angeles - N. Main Street (53 AQI, Moderate), and Reseda (22 AQI, Good). Further down the results, various websites like IQAir, AQICN, The Weather Channel, and AirNow are listed, offering more detailed information on the air quality in Los Angeles.

Current screenshots show the GUI with a map pinpointing AQI levels in different areas along with search result snippets from authoritative sources that monitor air pollution, indicating various statuses ranging from good to moderate.

This summary is based only on the latest observations. For a complete understanding, including the navigation process, refer to the full task history.
